import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function UserOptions() { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Background decoration */}
{/* Header */}

Choose Your Environmental Service

Select the service that helps you contribute to a sustainable future

{/* Recycling Pickup Service */}
navigate("/pickup-scheduling")} className="group relative bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-emerald-50/50 border-2 border-emerald-200/50 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl p-8 rounded-2xl text-center cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:border-emerald-300 overflow-hidden" >
♻️

Recycling Pickup

Schedule pickup of recyclable materials
पुनर्चक्रण सामग्री का पिकअप | रीसाइक्लिंग पिकअप

Get Started
{/* Track Status */}
navigate("/trackstatus")} className="group relative bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-blue-50/50 border-2 border-blue-200/50 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl p-8 rounded-2xl text-center cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:border-blue-300 overflow-hidden" >
🔍

Track Status

Check current status of your requests
अपने अनुरोध की स्थिति देखें | स्थिति ट्रैक करें

Track Now
{/* Voice Bot */}
navigate("/voice")} className="group relative bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-green-50/50 border-2 border-green-200/50 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl p-8 rounded-2xl text-center cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:border-green-300 overflow-hidden" >
🎤

Voice Bot

Use voice commands for complaints
आवाज से शिकायत करें | वॉइस बॉट

Start Voice
{/* Written Complaint */}
navigate("/complaint")} className="group relative bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-teal-50/50 border-2 border-teal-200/50 shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl p-8 rounded-2xl text-center cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:border-teal-300 overflow-hidden" >
✍️

Written Complaint

Submit written complaints online
लिखित शिकायत दर्ज करें | ऑनलाइन शिकायत

Submit Now
{/* Footer help text */}

Need help? Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with your environmental journey.
